description: Airtable schema for WhaleTrack-AI hackathon prototype. Defines tables and fields used to store whale transaction events.

tables.name: Whale_Transactions
tables.description: Stores all detected whale movements pulled from Qubic on-chain monitoring.

fields.name: tx_id
fields.description: Unique transaction ID from Qubic blockchain.

fields.name: wallet_address
fields.description: Source or destination wallet involved in the whale transaction.

fields.name: token
fields.description: Name or symbol of the token transferred.

fields.name: usd_value
fields.description: USD value at the time of detection.

fields.name: direction
fields.description: Movement direction relative to the tracker's target wallet.

fields.name: alert_status
fields.description: Whether the alert has been pushed to Discord.
